PROB_HTA_SBP_TXT: Please select the patient's sistolic blood pressure category.
PROB_HTA_SBP_COMMENT: A sistolic blood pressure greater than 139 mm Hg implies hypertension has already settled.
PROB_HTA_BMI_TXT: Please select the patient's Body Mass Index category
PROB_HTA_DBP_TXT: Please select the patient's diastolic blood pressure category.
PROB_HTA_DBP_COMMENT: A diastolic blood pressure greater than 89 mm Hg implies hypertension has already settled.
PROB_HTA_AGE_TXT: Please choose an apropriate age interval
PROB_HTA_PHYPERTENSION_TXT: Is there hypertension incidense on any of the patient's parents
PROB_HTA_PHYPERTENSION_ONE: Yes, in one of the parents
PROB_HTA_LEGEND: A Risk Score for Predicting near-term Incidence of Hypertension: the Framingham Heart Study.
PROB_HTA_PREVISION_LEGEND: Probability of Hypertensión onset in 1, 2 or 4 years
